elements.name: question1
elements.title: While dreaming. I was aware of the fact that the things I was experiencing in the dream were not real.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: While dreaming, I was able to remember my intention to do certain things in the dream.

elements.name: question3
elements.title: While dreaming, I was aware that the self I experienced in my dream wasn't the same as my waking self.

elements.name: question4
elements.title: In my dream, I was able to manipulate or control other dream characters in a way that would be possible in waking.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: While dreaming, I thought about other dream characters.

elements.name: question6
elements.title: While dreaming I was able to successfully perform supernatural actions (like flying or passing through walls).

elements.name: question7
elements.title: The emotions I experienced in my dream were exactly the same as those I would experience in such a situation during wakefulness.

elements.name: question8
elements.title: While dreaming, I was aware of the fact that the body I experienced in the dream did not correspond to my real sleep body.

elements.name: question9
elements.title: I was very certain that the things I was experiencing in my dream wouldn't have any consequences on the real world.

elements.name: question10
elements.title: While dreaming I was able to successfully control or change the dream environment in a way that would be impossible during wakefulness.

elements.name: question11
elements.title: While dreaming, I saw myself from outside

elements.name: question12
elements.title: While dreaming, I thought about my own actions.

elements.name: question13
elements.title: While dreaming, I had the feeling that I had forgotten something important.

elements.name: question14
elements.title: While dreaming, I was able to change or move objects (not persons) in a way that would be  impossible in waking.

elements.name: question15
elements.title: While dreaming I was not myself but a completely different person.

elements.name: question16
elements.title: While dreaming, I often asked myself whether I was dreaming.

elements.name: question17
elements.title: The thoughts I had in my dream were exactly the same as I would have in a similar situation during wakefulness.

elements.name: question18
elements.title: While dreaming, I had the feeling that I could remember my waking life.

elements.name: question19
elements.title: While dreaming, I was aware of the fact that other dream characters in my dream were not real.

elements.name: question20
elements.title: Most things that happened in my dream could have also happened during wakefulness.

elements.name: question21
elements.title: I watched the dream from the outside, as if on a screen.

elements.name: question22
elements.title: While dreaming, I often thought about the things I was experiencing.

elements.name: question23
elements.title: I was able to influence the story line of my dreams at will/at libitum.

elements.name: question24
elements.title: While dreaming, I was able to remember certain plans for the future.

elements.name: question25
elements.title: While dreaming, I felt euphoric/upbeat.

elements.name: question26
elements.title: While dreaming, I had strong negative feelings.

elements.name: question27
elements.title: While dreaming, I had strong positive feelings.

elements.name: question28
elements.title: While dreaming, I felt very anxious.
